meanings.definition: A substance that has been homogenized.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the homogenate under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The homogenate was used in the experiment to ensure consistent results.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled the homogenate, creating a messy situation in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The homogenate of flavors in the dish created a harmonious blend of tastes.
meanings.sent5: The homogenate of colors in the painting made it visually appealing.

meanings.sent1: The blender will homogenate the ingredients into a smooth mixture.
meanings.sent2: She needed to homogenate the solution before conducting the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The machine homogenated the materials with impressive speed.
meanings.sent4: His speech homogenated the diverse audience into a unified group.
meanings.sent5: The artist homogenated various styles to create a unique masterpiece.
